death_claim_process.title: Please visit our nearest local branch to register your claim.
death_claim_process.subtitle: Death Claim Process

data.subtitle: ● Written information to the company by the claimant
● Claim related notarized document received from the claimant
● Discharge voucher sent to the claimant
● Signed and stamped discharge voucher received from the claimant
● Claim amount paid/denied letter sent to the claimant

non_death_claim_process.title: Please visit our nearest local branch to register your claim.
non_death_claim_process.subtitle: Non-Death Claim Process

data.subtitle: ● Written information to the company by the claimant
● Claim related notarized document received from the claimant
● Review and Decision made by the company
● Discharge voucher sent to the claimant
● Signed and stamped discharge voucher received from the claimant
● Claim amount paid/denied letter sent to the claimant

claim_process.title: Please choose whether it is death claim or non-death claim.
